abilities.title: Lessons Learned
abilities.text: At the start of this Unit's activation, one character in this Unit may . Force Rush Each character in this Unit may . After all moves have been resolved, If a character in this Unit is within 2 of another allied Force User character, this Unit immediately makes a focus action. Deflect After a attack targeting a character in this Unit is resolved, this Unit may use this ability. If the attack roll contained one or more results, the attacking Unit suffers . Stretch out with your feelings When a character in this Unit makes a attack as part of a combat action, before dice are rolled, this Unit may use this ability. During this attack, when resolving a from one of its chosen Combat Tree Options, the attacker may choose another allied character within 3 instead of the normal 2, to remove a condition or from.
